dcterms:creator: Zhexiong Liu
Meiqi Guo
Yue Dai
Diane Litman
dcterms:description: A multi-modal tweet dataset for image persuasiveness mining, featuring tweets centered on contentious topics like gun control and abortion, including images with visual elements and optical characters.
dcterms:title: ImageArg

dcterms:creator: Zhexiong Liu
Mohamed Elaraby
Yang Zhong
Diane Litman
dcterms:description: The first shared task in multimodal argument mining, centered around the ImageArg dataset, divided into two subtasks: Argumentative Stance Classification and Image Persuasiveness Classification.
dcterms:title: ImageArg Shared Task 2023

dcterms:creator: George A. Miller
dcterms:description: A lexical database for English that provides a rich set of semantic relationships between words, useful for data augmentation in natural language processing tasks.
dcterms:title: WordNet
